description: Creates a new device in a global network. If you specify both a site ID and a location, the location of the site is used for visualization in the Network Manager console.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the global network.

parameters.name: AWSLocation
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services location of the device, if applicable. For an on-premises device, you can omit this parameter. Zone (string) --- The Zone that the device is located in. Specify the ID of an Availability Zone, Local Zone, Wavelength Zone, or an Outpost. SubnetArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the subnet that the device is located in.

nested_params.name: Zone
nested_params.description: The Zone that the device is located in. Specify the ID of an Availability Zone, Local Zone, Wavelength Zone, or an Outpost.

nested_params.name: SubnetArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the subnet that the device is located in.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A description of the device. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

parameters.name: Vendor
parameters.description: The vendor of the device. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

parameters.name: Model
parameters.description: The model of the device. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

parameters.name: SerialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the device. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: The location of the device. Address (string) --- The physical address. Latitude (string) --- The latitude. Longitude (string) --- The longitude.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to apply to the resource during creation. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters. Value (string) --- The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_items.name: DeviceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: AWSLocation
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services location of the device.

nested_items.name: Zone
nested_items.description: The Zone that the device is located in. Specify the ID of an Availability Zone, Local Zone, Wavelength Zone, or an Outpost.

nested_items.name: SubnetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the subnet that the device is located in.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the site was created.
